description: Milestones that have been hit by a user

milestoneId.description: A unique ID for the milestone

milestoneType.description: The type of milestone that has been hit by the user, there should only be one milestone per milestoneType at any one time

milestoneMessage.description: The message to be displayed to the user related to the type of milestone

generatedDate.description: The date and time that the milestone was identified and generated on MDTP, not necessarily when the milestone was actually hit
